personal.name: Aaditya Chandra Gupta

personal.bio: Passionate software developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and staying updated with the latest technologies.

projects.title: AI Chat Application

experience.description: I am currently a student at Reva University, pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA). My academic journey is helping me build a strong foundation in computer science and software development.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate student learning and improving my skills in web development and software engineering.
paragraphs: I am learning various technologies including React, Node.js, Java, and Python to build full-stack applications.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects. I believe in continuous learning and improving my skills.
I'm always open to exciting opportunities. feel free to reach out!
